content.description:
<math alttext="The figure presents a 2 row table with 5 columns of data. The heading for row 1 is “x.” The heading for row 2 is “f of x.” The data are as follows. Column 1. x is 0. f of x is 8. Column 2. x is 4. f of x is 0. Column 3. x is 8. f of x is 2. Column 4. x is 12. f of x is 10. Column 5. x is 16. f of x is 1." overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtable columnlines="solid" equalcolumns="true" equalrows="true" frame="solid" rowlines="solid" width="auto"> <mtr> <mtd> <mi>x</mi> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>0</mn> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>4</mn> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>8</mn> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>12</mn> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>16</mn> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mtext>  </mtext> </mrow> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>8</mn> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>0</mn> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>2</mn> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>10</mn> </mtd> <mtd> <mn>1</mn> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

The table above gives selected values for the differentiable function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: In which of the following intervals must there be a number <math alttext="c" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> such that <math alttext="f prime of c, equals 2" overflow="scroll"> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>′</mo> </mrow> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>c</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </math> ?

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
